NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PYE: Poke! Thank goodness you're here, my friend. We're positively lost: is this not the method of entry into the Deep Storm Station? 2 1 IDAEA: We have been trying to warp there from this warp tower, but this warp transmitter seems to only bring us to Statue Island! 3 2 POKE: Did the two of you not receive directions from Cassava? Even I received instructions from him - through Daz! 4 1 POKE: Goodness, no! We need to head to the new warp pad constructed at the Construction Yard on Giant's Deep as fast as we can, before the test begins! 5 3 PYE: Wait! I remember now - Cassava gave me a projection stone to the Deep Storm Station some time ago so we could observe the test through the projection pool! Oh, where did I leave it... 6 5 IDAEA: Pye! How could you forget such an important detail? It must be somewhere in that clutter you always leave on the Sun Station's catwalk... 7 6 POKE: There's no time to waste! Come, my friends - let us return to the Sun Station at once to find that projection stone! SS R1 7 SS R2 6 GD Tower EX4 2
